title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8187-2.10 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8187-2.10 - Applicability

State Regulations

This Subpart applies only to counties which equalize
assessments for purposes of county tax apportionment pursuant to title one of
article eight of the Real Property Tax Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
§§
8187-2.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
